snippet.title: Ignis Universia: Awakening of the Erudite Empress Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A light-hearted JRPG and Visual Novel adventure about the Chosen Sisters who are destined to save the world again.

Now in Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/randompotion/ignis-universia

©2022 Random Potion. All rights reserved except music You Fulca / Wingless Seraph.
